data.name: Matei Dragos
data.professionalSummary:
Junior Software Engineer specializing in C# with additional expertise in C/C++ and Python. Proficient in modern web
development technologies, including JavaScript, React, Next.js, HTML, and CSS, with strong version control skills using
Git. Experienced in working with SQL, MySQL, and MongoDB databases for data management, querying, and
optimization. Adept at writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code, diagnosing and debugging complex issues, and
applying analytical thinking to deliver precise, effective solutions. Creative and adaptable, with a passion for addressing
real-world software challenges and contributing to the development of high-quality, innovative applications.
skills: GitLab Other Technologies & Concepts: RESTful APIs
